title: BTC address
extract: Address. A Bitcoin address, or simply address, is an identifier of 26-35 alphanumeric characters, beginning with the number 1 or 3 , that represents a possible destination for a bitcoin payment. Addresses can be generated at no cost by any user of Bitcoin.Mar 27, 2018
extract_html: Address. A Bitcoin address, or simply address, is an identifier of 26-35 alphanumeric characters, beginning with the number 1 or 3 , that represents a possible destination for a bitcoin payment. Addresses can be generated at no cost by any user of Bitcoin.Mar 27, 2018
